message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $800000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.
I'm very interested in the product, but I think $800000 is a bit steep. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $650000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your concerns about the price, but I'm not willing to go as low as $650000. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll offer you the product for $750000. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, and I believe it's still a great value considering the product's worth to you.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $750000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $675000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I understand that $675000 is still a bit above your target price, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go below $725000. I'm willing to compromise again and offer you the product for $720000. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, and I believe it's still a great value considering the product's worth to you.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $720000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $695000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I understand that $695000 is still a bit above your target price, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go below $715000. I'm willing to compromise again and offer you the product for $710000. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, and I believe it's still a great value considering the product's worth to you.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $710000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $690000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting close to the end of our negotiation, Bob. I'm willing to make one final compromise. I'll offer you the product for $700000. This is as low as I'm willing to go, and I believe it's still a great value considering the product's worth to you.

I understand that we're at the end of our negotiation, and I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, I'm still not willing to pay $700000. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $695000. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
